title: silver looking to start up and manage a ranked team in 2017
body:
hey,

i'm looking to start up and manage a ranked team in season 7. id like to play with a few of you, gauge who is the best as a team player and who is open to discussion about game play etc. i want a team who is interested in ranking together in ranked ques and is semi serious.

add me in game: span

replies.body: Honestly.. lack of guns is the worst thing graphics are tops imo 2nd best battlefield
I got ranked b3 in pre season, i'm a Renekton Main.
Just added you, I'm on holidays so keen to get into some ranked

Hey dude keen, 
ADC, MID AND JG 
ADD dawgntheboys. Il b playing with teams on that one but add 
Dawgsbro aswell cuz I'm tryn to rank it up
i can sup / jungle - i play semi casual atm im just playing BF1 till pre-season starts
How good is BF1 would you recommend it?
I'm a top/jg/mid/sup so if you need any of these, hmu ;) xx
